description: Erection of new boundary wall and installation of rainwater and waste water pipes
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and as stated within 'Cast Iron drainage, rainwater pipe and gutter systems - Saint Gobain' unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Section 72 of the Planning  (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act, 1990 Act, the NPPF 2021, Policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Notwithstanding the requirements of planning condition 3 above and in relation to the proposed brick walls on site, samples of the proposed bricks must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing prior to the commencement of any above ground works.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Section 72 of the Planning  (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act, 1990 Act, the NPPF 2021, Policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the approved tree protection measures and construction methods set out within 'Tree Survey Arboricultural Impact Assessment, prepared by Aureus Arboricultural Surveys LTD, received 10 November 2021' unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To safeguard trees worthy of retention and in the interests of the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
